00001 <?php
00017 function smarty_make_timestamp($string)
00018 {
00019     if(empty($string)) {
00020         // use "now":
00021         $time = time();
00022 
00023     } elseif (preg_match('/^\d{14}$/', $string)) {
00024         // it is mysql timestamp format of YYYYMMDDHHMMSS?            
00025         $time = mktime(substr($string, 8, 2),substr($string, 10, 2),substr($string, 12, 2),
00026                        substr($string, 4, 2),substr($string, 6, 2),substr($string, 0, 4));
00027         
00028     } elseif (is_numeric($string)) {
00029         // it is a numeric string, we handle it as timestamp
00030         $time = (int)$string;
00031         
00032     } else {
00033         // strtotime should handle it
00034         $time = strtotime($string);
00035         if ($time == -1 || $time === false) {
00036             // strtotime() was not able to parse $string, use "now":
00037             $time = time();
00038         }
00039     }
00040     return $time;
00041 
00042 }

00045 
00046 ?>
